bibl.title: Triphis in the White Monastery: Reused Temple Blocks from Sohag. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Previously unrecorded inscriptions on temple blocks reused in the Church of St. Shenoute near Sohag confirm that a group of limestone ceiling blocks derive from the temple of Repyt at nearby Atripe. This discovery may support Shenoute's repeated claims to have destroyed this particular temple.
bibl.seg: KLOTZ David, Triphis in the White Monastery: Reused Temple Blocks from Sohag. Avec résumé en anglais.

Previously unrecorded inscriptions on temple blocks reused in the Church of St. Shenoute near Sohag confirm that a group of limestone ceiling blocks derive from the temple of Repyt at nearby Atripe. This discovery may support Shenoute's repeated claims to have destroyed this particular temple.
